alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and southwestern Nassau Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Howard Beach, or near Kennedy Airport, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jamaica around 710 PM EDT. Kennedy Airport around 715 PM EDT. Woodmere around 730 PM EDT. Valley Stream and Elmont around 735 PM EDT. Lynbrook around 745 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
